document.discussion_title: General Discussions • From playboy to president? Trump’s past crude sex talk collides with his White House bid.
document.topic_text: Post by AI2.0 » Tue May 10, 2016 3:51 pm dconrad000 wrote: It's happened before. I am thinking about Alma the Younger and the sons of Mosiah...who changed and went on to do some good with their lives...and they were in essence the sons of the prophet and had been raised with a knowledge of the truth. Trump is not a member of the church -- yet. One should ask themselves if they believe in the power of the atonement and the ability of people to decide to change for the better. I really don't understand this level of delusion. Donald Trump is not repentant because he doesn't believe there is anything wrong with his lifestyle, he's said so, he's proud of all his 'conquests', married and single. He's not going to join the LDS church, he thinks we're 'aliens', as in wierdos.If you're going to be all in for Trump you'd better get used to his true character (and the true character of the people he surrounds himself with and who uphold him) because he's actually a very crude, lascivious person--and he's not at all interested in changing.The Trumpsters were warned about his baggage but they didn't care. I hope they have some ideas for how they are going sell Trump in a general election because people who care about the moral character of their candidate are going to have a difficult time voting for this man and those who don't like sexists are just going to refuse to vote for him. "...the ultimate most annoying person on this forum, A.120!"
